Bend.Mountain View High School (Bend, Oregon):
Mountain View High School is a public high school located in Bend, Oregon, United States.


== History ==
Mountain View High School opened in 1979 as the second high school in the greater Bend, Oregon, area. It was the first new high school in the area since Bend High School had opened in 1904, and the two schools remained the only traditional high schools in Bend until Summit High School opened in 2001 (Marshall High School is a magnet high school also located in Bend).
